title: Home Depot fire: Officials identify Dyllin Jaycruz Gogue as suspect who intentionally started massive 5-alarm blaze in San Jose - KGO-TV
content:
1. Home Depot fire: Officials identify Dyllin Jaycruz Gogue as suspect who intentionally started massive 5-alarm blaze in San Jose  KGO-TV
  2. Suspect Identified in Massive Arson Fire at San Jose Home Depot  NBC Bay Area
  3. California man charged in Home Depot fire so large it was detected from space  Fox News
  4. Suspect Named In Devastating Home Depot Blaze  SF Gate
  5. Man charged with arson in connection with massive fire at a California Home Depot that could be seen from space, police say  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The DA says suspect Dyllin Jaycruz Gogue lit the fire in an aisle, tried to leave the store with a cart of stolen tools, then fled the scene in a vehicle. He then allegedly continued his attempted theft spree at a Macy's.
